'''1.21.1''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on June 20, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/27737332869133-Minecraft-1-21-1-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.1 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 20, 2024}}</ref> which fixes two bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a hardlock that could occur when playing splitscreen [[multiplayer]] on PlayStation 4.
* Fixed a bug where players with a freshly installed game needed to restart before being able to see [[Realms Stories]].
